00154 inline CMatrix2d::CMatrix2d(const CVector2d& axisX, const CVector2d& axisY)
00155 {
00156        SetAt(0, 0, axisX[0]);
00157        SetAt(0, 1, axisX[1]);
00158        SetAt(1, 0, axisY[0]);
00159        SetAt(1, 1, axisY[1]);
00160 }
00161 
00162 
00163 inline CMatrix2d::CMatrix2d(double m11, double m12, double m21, double m22)
00164 {
00165        SetAt(0, 0, m11);
00166        SetAt(0, 1, m12);
00167        SetAt(1, 0, m21);
00168        SetAt(1, 1, m22);
00169 }
00170

00192 inline CVector2d CMatrix2d::GetAxisX() const

00194        return CVector2d(GetAt(0, 0), GetAt(0, 1));

00214 inline void CMatrix2d::GetAxesLengths(CVector2d& result) const
00215 {
00216        result.SetX(GetAxisX().GetLength());
00217        result.SetY(GetAxisY().GetLength());
00218 }

00230 
00231 inline CMatrix2d CMatrix2d::GetTransposed() const
00232 {
00233        return CMatrix2d(GetAt(0, 0), GetAt(0, 1), GetAt(1, 0), GetAt(1, 1));
00234 }
00235 
00236 
00237 inline double CMatrix2d::GetDet() const
00238 {
00239        return GetAt(0, 0) * GetAt(1, 1) - GetAt(0, 1) * GetAt(1, 0);
00240 }

00263 inline CMatrix2d CMatrix2d::operator/(double scale) const
00264 {
